aka: Cream Lemon - Another Day of Ami
this_title: くりいむレモン またの日の亜美
trans_title: 奶油柠檬之亚美的另一天
Cream Lemon - Another Day of Ami
introduction: 【Based on comic books】The Cream Lemon Video Series based on the popular manga of the same title, focusing on the forbidden love between brothers and sisters. 4th Title: My brother belongs to me .Ami has a half-brother, Hiroshi, whom she met only once in her life. She decides to go live with him when she finds out that he suffers from depression since his little sister, Mami killed herself. However, Ami soon finds out that Mami’s death was the result of forbidden love and pregnancy with Hiroshi. Hiroshi’s depression is a result of his guilt.Ami makes up her mind to tell Hiroshi that she will do whatever he wants so he can forget about Mami. Ami spends agonizing days as Hiroshi’s marionette…
chinese_title: 奶油柠檬之亚美的另一天
foreign_title: くりいむレモン またの日の亜美
